full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LAS SGRUB PA’I LAM BSANGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES ‘DI NI DGON KHANG LHA’I SKU BRTEN BZHENGS DKYIL ‘KHOR GZHAL YAS KHANG GRONG KHYER ‘DZOD DANG CHOS RNG ‘GRO ZOR MDO GLUD LAS BZHI DANG LAM DU BZHUGS GANG ZHIG ‘PHRIN LAS ‘GRUB BYED PA’O, ,CES PA’I ‘DI NI GSER SKYEMS DRAN NAS YID CES PA’I ‘DOD PAS BAN RGAN BLO BZANG MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA’O, ,)
